[++Misc++]

[Coins Max(Press Y)]
DD000000 00000800
104A2810 0000FFFF
{Press Y. Close and reopen suitcase}

[--]

[++Battle codes++]

[Exp in Battle (R+Down/R+UP)]
DD000000 00000180
D3000000 31000000
000A12B8 000003E7
D1000000 00000000
DD000000 00000140
D3000000 31000000
000A18E8 000003E7
D1000000 00000000
{R+down for Mario
R+Up for Luigi}

[Shields(L+Up)]
DD000000 00000240
D3000000 31000000
000A11E0 00000063
D3000000 31000000
000A1810 00000063
D1000000 00000000

[--]

[++item Codes++]

[Max Battle Items Press Y + UP]
DD000000 00000840
C0000000 00000013
004A2814 00000063
DC000000 00000001
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Press Y and UP}

[All Blends Press Y + Down]
DD000000 00000880
C0000000 00000007
004A2827 00000063
DC000000 00000001
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Press Y then Down}

[All Beans Y + Left]
DD000000 00000820
C0000000 00000004
004A28F0 00000063
DC000000 00000001
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Press Y and Left}

[All Pants X+Up]
DD000000 00000440
C0000000 00000035
004A2834 00000003
DC000000 00000001
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000

[All badges X+Down]
DD000000 00000480
C0000000 0000003C
004A286B 00000003
DC000000 00000001
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000

[--]
